HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: [XND]Survival Tools officially reborn.|Introduced new tool tiers:|img:images/primal_axe,images/primal_hammer,images/primal_sickle|caption:Primitive tools|img:images/Axe,images/Hammer,images/Pickaxe,images/Sickle|caption:Medieval tools (Original)|img:images/Shovel,images/Chainsaw,images/ConstructionTool,images/JackHammer|caption:Modern tools|img:images/GlitterworldMultitool|caption:Spacer tool (Original)|Introduced various mod compatibilities:|*Vanilla Weapons Expanded|*RPG Level Up|*Misc Robots++|*In principle all modded jobs
